short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Common Extension is a self-custody wallet for Aleph Zero EVM, enabling fast and private transactions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It allows you to transact on-chain while maintaining complete control of your assets and privacy.

Here's what you can do with the V1 release:
- Easily create a new wallet with private and public accounts or import your existing wallet.
- Shield AZERO tokens and transact privately.
- Send and receive AZERO tokens with visible balances
- Convenient side-panel view for uninterrupted transactions.

The current version includes a 100 AZERO shielding limit to prioritise security pre-audit, future updates will lift this cap and introduce new features like smart yield earning, swaps, ERC20 token support and much more!
